Summary: Extremely huge, about a square mile. Moving slow in the east direction then disappeared
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Troy
There were no other sightings in Troy on or around December 24th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsMy brother and I were driving in Troy and saw a giant craft hovering. It was around 10 15 at night. We got out of the car to watch it. It was a triangle formation with three orange balls of light. It was there for about 3 to 7 minutes and very slowly started moving east. Then it was gone.
